package.name: HTML_Minification_by_Jemoon
package.summary: Simple and light extension which minifies HTML. It reduces document's size by approx. 10 - 15%.
package.description: This small extension reduces overall size of all html documents which are send to customer's browser. It can save about 10 - 15% of original file size by removing all unnecessary comments, whitespaces and new lines from documents. As a result you'll get some performance boost - how it will work in your case? Please share the result in comments.
package.notes: Stable (tested with 1.5.0.0 and above till 1.7.0.0). Can be disabled for development purposes in at System -> Configuration -> Developer (under 'Advanced' tab) -> HTML Settings.
